dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A listener just wrote in, uh, asking about the new eGov Mobile app update for foreign diploma recognition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A listener just wrote in, uh, asking about the new eGov Mobile app update for foreign diploma recognition.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, that's a huge deal for graduates coming back to Kazakhstan. It says the review time is significantly shortened, which is a big improvement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, that's a huge deal for graduates coming back to Kazakhstan. It says the review time is significantly shortened, which is a big improvement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "This significantly shortens the application review time and makes the service more convenient for users," the announcement states.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. I mean, before this, you had to go through so much paperwork, right? Now it's all in the app.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. I mean, before this, you had to go through so much paperwork, right? Now it's all in the app.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they mention you get an electronic certificate if it's approved, or a justified refusal if not. So it's transparent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they mention you get an electronic certificate if it's approved, or a justified refusal if not. So it's transparent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Upon completion, applicants receive either an electronic certificate confirming diploma recognition or a justified refusal, depending on the legal grounds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's important—knowing why something was denied helps people figure out their next steps.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's important-knowing why something was denied helps people figure out their next steps.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, it's not just for jobs; it says it's for further education too, which is great for students planning to continue studying here.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, it's not just for jobs; it says it's for further education too, which is great for students planning to continue studying here.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the official portal eGov.kz, the service enables graduates of foreign universities to officially validate their diplomas for employment or further education in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like if someone did their bachelor's abroad and wants to do a master's in Kazakhstan, this makes it way smoother.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like if someone did their bachelor's abroad and wants to do a master's in Kazakhstan, this makes it way smoother.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And remember, they also added that feature for checking how many mobile numbers are registered to one IIN? Seems like eGov is really expanding its services.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And remember, they also added that feature for checking how many mobile numbers are registered to one I I N? Seems like eGov is really expanding its services.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, a new function appeared in eGov for checking the number of registered mobile numbers for one IIN.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's becoming a one-stop shop for a lot of government-related needs, which is super convenient.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's becoming a one-stop shop for a lot of government-related needs, which is super convenient.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I wonder how many people have already used the diploma recognition feature since it launched.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I wonder how many people have already used the diploma recognition feature since it launched.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Good question—they didn't share numbers yet, but given how many Kazakh students study abroad, I bet it's getting traction.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good question-they didn't share numbers yet, but given how many Kazakh students study abroad, I bet it's getting traction.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Anything that cuts down bureaucracy is a win in my book.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Anything that cuts down bureaucracy is a win in my book.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Well, thanks to our listener for sending that question! Keep 'em coming.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Well, thanks to our listener for sending that question! Keep 'em coming.
